props.alignDot: Align the dot to the **start** or **end** of the item
props.color: Applies specified color to the item dot - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors)
props.fillDot: Remove outer border of item dot, making the color fill the entire dot
props.hideOpposite: Hide opposite content if it exists
props.icon: Apply a specific icon to the inside dot using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.
props.index: Used to allow dynamically shown items to be re-inserted in the correct position
props.side: Show the item either **before** or **after** the timeline. This will override the implicit ordering of items, but will in turn be overriden by the `v-timeline` **single-side** prop

slots.icon: Used to customize the icon inside the item dot
slots.opposite: Used to customize the opposite side of timeline items
